EmailTemplate.name: Div SF Not Eligible New Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve partnered with Wevorce – more information inside
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LegalZoom.com
View online
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your inquiry. Since we are no longer offering divorce services in your area, we've partnered with Wevorce to help meet your needs. For information on starting a new order, including pricing and process, visit our site to learn more.
Still have questions? You can speak with a Wevorce customer service representative directly. Call (855) 938-6723 or email support@wevorce.com.
We're here to help.
Your LegalZoom Team
Manage My Account | Explore Services Privacy Policy
Please do not reply to this message. This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: $EMAIL_ADDRESS_$
